## MongoDBLink type

MongoDB connection URI without name &amp; params

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MongoDBLink = string;
```

## Example


```
mongodb://user:pass&@mongodb-eu-fr-west:27017,mongodb-eu-fr-est:27017,mongodb-eu-be:2017/
```
